# isEditing

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is in an editable state.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEditing: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When a cell is in an editable state, it displays the editing controls specified for it: the green insertion control, the red deletion control, or (on the right side) the reordering control. Use [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewCell/editingStyle-swift.property] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITableViewCell/showsReorderControl] to specify these controls for the cell.

## Editing the cell

- **setEditing(_:animated:)**: Toggles the cell into and out of editing mode.
- **editingStyle**: The editing style of the cell.
- **UITableViewCell.EditingStyle**: The editing control used by a cell.
- **showingDeleteConfirmation**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the cell is currently showing the delete-confirmation button.
- **showsReorderControl**: A Boolean value that determines whether the cell shows the reordering control.
